definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
Capricorn (constellation and sign of the zodiac)/Japanese variant of 魔羯座

sentences.english: He stopped and chuckled as he tugged at his gray goatee .
sentences.chinese: 说到这里他停了下来，捋着山羊胡子格格地笑着。

sentences.english: Tie to the post of Unconcern the goats of Vice and Virtue.
sentences.chinese: 把恶习与美德两头山羊绑在漫不经心的柱子上。

sentences.english: He has a distinctive goatee, so I can recognize him easily.
sentences.chinese: 他留着独特的山羊胡子，所以我很容易就认出他来了。

sentences.english: Dall's sheep and mountain goats are found in the park's alpine environment.
sentences.chinese: 公园的山区还有大角羊和山羊出没。

sentences.english: The goat is butting the tree.
Do you know when the mountain goats give birth?
sentences.chinese: 山岩间的野山羊几时生产，你知道吗？

sentences.english: With that he skipped even higher up the mountain while the wolf loped disappointedly away.
sentences.chinese: 山羊说完就向山上更高的地方跳去，狼失望地跑了。

sentences.english: That day, he removed the male goats that were streaked and spotted.
sentences.chinese: 当天拉班就将有条纹有斑点的公山羊。

sentences.english: To let us go first, the goat pounces on the wolves strongly.
sentences.chinese: 为了让我们先走，大山羊不顾死活地朝狼群扑了过去。

sentences.english: Make curtains of goat hair for the tent over the tabernacle-eleven altogether.
sentences.chinese: 你要用山羊毛织十一幅幔子，作为帐幕以上的罩棚。

sentences.english: These goats are specially bred for their wool.
sentences.chinese: 这些山羊是专为剪取羊毛而饲养的。

sentences.english: We keep a few fowls and some goats.
sentences.chinese: 我们养了几只鸡和一些山羊。

sentences.english: Tissue engineered bone had good ability to repair large segment tibia defect of Caprine.
sentences.chinese: 组织工程骨具有良好的修复山羊大段骨缺损的能力。

sentences.english: But the little kids knew that it was the wolf, by the rough voice.
sentences.chinese: 可是，小山羊们听到粗哑的声音，立刻知道是狼来了。

sentences.english: He is to lay his hand on its head and slaughter it in front of the Tent of Meeting.
sentences.chinese: 要按手在山羊头上，宰于会幕前。

sentences.english: Khaki tote bags and metallic suede clutch bags appeal to you, since you want your accessories to be as eclectic as you are.
sentences.chinese: 卡其布或金属的小山羊皮裁制手提包都很衬你哦。
